title.en: Soshite Boku wa Koi wo Suru

description.en:
1, 5) Catamountain
Even though the President of the Student Council, Aoyagi, isn’t much of a fighter, he's still determined to bust any troublemakers in school. It’s a good thing that he can always rely on his strong and dependable kouhai, Hayami, the Treasury of the Student Council, to watch his back. Until one day, Hayami drew him close and demanded, “I want to embrace you”…!?

2-3) Moe Love
Riku is in love with Chisato, a bishoujo anime otaku, that doesn't see anything other than his moe figurines. Will Riku be able to win his love?

4) One More Kiss
Taiga comes home one day to find a stranger in his house, eating his cup nuddles. The stranger, Higuchi, is a very talented illustrator, and his style is very similar to someone Taiga knew when he was in high school. Someone Taiga had forced himself upon...
